insights.text: Use staged allocation to control timing risk and keep flexibility.
Keep position sizing disciplined and avoid overreaction to single headlines.
Gold weight helps absorb macro and risk-off shocks.

advisor_briefing.headline: Portfolio Pulse: NVDA.US drives latest market narrative
advisor_briefing.macro_summary: 7-day NAV move is -0.18%. Current allocation is Cash 10.8%, Gold 28.5%, US Stocks 60.6%. Portfolio remains diversified, but near-term volatility can be elevated around headline-heavy sessions.
advisor_briefing.verdict: Keep diversified core positions and adjust incrementally, not aggressively.

suggestions.rationale: Use staged allocation to control timing risk and keep flexibility.
Keep position sizing disciplined and avoid overreaction to single headlines.
Gold weight helps absorb macro and risk-off shocks.

risks: Short-term market reactions to macro headlines can exceed fundamentals.
Single-name concentration risk can amplify drawdowns.

news_context.title: How Sovereign AI Projects Could Reframe The NVIDIA Investment Story
news_context.summary: NVIDIA (NasdaqGS:NVDA) is expanding its role in sovereign-scale AI, with new gigawatt-level AI factory projects in India aimed at building production-grade national AI capabilities. The company is deepening ties with telecom partners through Open RAN and spectrum intelligence projects, using its platforms to support mobile network modernization. NVIDIA hardware and software are being adopted in enterprise AI data stacks and confidential compute deployments in North America and Australia,...

news_context.title: Bitcoin Is Headed to $500,000. This Wall Street Analyst Explains Why.
news_context.summary: Bitcoin investors may soon forget the recent correction.

news_context.title: Bank of America revamps gold stock price target for 2026
news_context.summary: Gold has had a wild few weeks, but Bank of America is not flinching. The bank just reset its 12-month gold price target to $6,000 per ounce, even as the metal navigates some of the most turbulent policy headlines of the year. Bank of America analysts cited policy uncertainty around Federal Reserve ...

news_context.title: Warren Buffett's Final $373 Billion Warning Sent Shockwaves Through Wall Street
news_context.summary: The Oracle of Omaha's actions leading up to his retirement make clear that the time to be fearful when others are greedy is here.

news_context.title: Why Orla Mining (TSX:OLA) Is Up 15.2% After Huge Camino Rojo Underground PEA Reveal
news_context.summary: In February 2026, Orla Mining announced positive Preliminary Economic Assessment results for a stand-alone underground project beneath its existing Camino Rojo open pit mine in Mexico, highlighting an after-tax NPV5% of US$3.30 billion and a very large IRR at a US$5,000/oz gold price. The study points to a capital-efficient, potentially multi-decade underground operation with over 4 million ounces gold equivalent in measured and indicated resources and a phased de-risking program through...

news_context.title: Frontline (NYSE:FRO) Valuation Check After Q4 Profit Surge And Fleet Renewal Moves
news_context.summary: Frontline (FRO) is back in focus after reporting fourth quarter 2025 earnings that showed US$624.5 million in revenue and US$227.9 million in net income, along with ongoing fleet renewal and boardroom changes. See our latest analysis for Frontline. The earnings surprise and record dividend have arrived alongside powerful momentum, with a 35.25% 1 month share price return and an 84.40% year to date share price return feeding into a very large 5 year total shareholder return. Taken together,...

global_context.title: Insight Holdings Trims AppFolio as Property Software Faces a More Selective SaaS Market
global_context.summary: Insight Holdings reduced its stake in AppFolio, a property management software provider whose shares have lagged the broader market over the past year. With real estate transaction activity slower and SaaS valuations more selective, investors are reassessing how much growth is tied to units under management versus higher-margin payments and services.

global_context.title: Public Storage (PSA): A Bull Case Theory
global_context.summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Public Storage on R. Dennis’s Substack by OppCost. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on PSA. Public Storage’s share was trading at $304.11 as of February 24th. PSA’s trailing and forward P/E were 31.53 and 28.41 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Public Storage, a member of the S&P 500, is a REIT that primarily acquires, develops, owns, and operates self-storage facilities. PSA has reinforced its leadership in the […]

global_context.title: Scott Bessent Sidesteps $134 Billion Tariff Refund Question, Calls Corporate Lawsuits 'Ultimate Corporate Welfare'
global_context.summary: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent refused to commit to issuing $134 billion in potential tariff refunds during a post-State of the Union interview, instead framing corporate demands for repayment as a form of government handout. The Refund Standoff Following President Donald Trump's 2026 State of the Union address, Bessent addressed the growing legal and financial fallout from a recent Supreme Court ruling that restricted the administration's tariff authorities.
